attributes.action: Free higher education for students. Student Loans, University courses etc.
attributes.additional_details: The world is moving fast, other countries are getting smarter, and the U.K is falling behind. We need to increase the countries I.Q level, and help poor and skeptical people to advance themselves and improve our economy. Too many people get in debt and are discouraged by the system. The government needs to look into a new plan to upgrade this sector, or we will fall behind other countries general development. Why should money be an obstacle? All people should be given a free chance.
attributes.background: Free education and free grants for all ages and professions for every UK citizen past, present and future. We need to be looking into encouraging all citizens to undertake higher educational subjects, and gain the help and support they need to fulfill their education.
